page.title: 07APPEARENCE OF CHURCH
page.content:
There is a beautiful stained glass arched window of Jesus and his disciples. Most of the windows are stained glass. In-side: In-side there are many stone pillars joined by arches which help to create an impressive ceiling. There are many carvings and stone faces on the walls and ceiling. These were used to teach people,who could not read or write,about christianity.
What we think of the church: Most people in Milford are christians. Part of their faith is to pray to God and his son Jesus. Churches are where people meet to pray.The buildings are usually old and beautiful.People like to dress nicely when they go there and behave in a quiet way.In churches there are bibles which tell you
